Concept.Comments: In case of error, message to the user to know how to continue. Row 1
Concept.String: An error was found while loading measures.

Concept.Id: ASK THE USER IF CONTINUE R2
Concept.Comments: In case of error, message to the user to know how to continue. Row 2
Concept.String: It can depend on file corruption.

Concept.Id: ASK THE USER IF CONTINUE R3

Concept.Id: ASK THE USER IF CONTINUE R4

Concept.Id: ASK THE USER IF CONTINUE R5

Concept.String: Do you want to reset measures?
